description:
Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less Samurai! Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichimi Souzen! Shougeki no Kubi dake Samurai Toujou!
L’équipage au Chapeau de paille stupéfait. Le samouraï qui n’avait pas de corps
The Straw Hats Stunned! Enter: A Samurai`s Horrifying Severed Head!
Мугивары в замешательстве! Появлениие странного безголового самурая!
一味騒然! 衝撃の首だけ侍登場!
